"A trash can that uses biodegradable materials to break down organic waste and reduce the amount of waste sent to landfills."
"A smart trash can that uses sensors to detect when it's full and automatically alerts the appropriate waste management personnel to empty it."
"A trash can that uses a self-cleaning mechanism to eliminate odors and bacteria, making it more hygienic and convenient to use."
"A trash can that is designed to be modular and customizable, allowing users to choose the size, shape, and color that best suits their needs."
"A trash can that uses augmented reality technology to provide users with information on proper waste sorting and recycling, helping to reduce waste and promote sustainability."
